attributes.action: Reopen all one-way and no through roads, that have been closed throughout the years, and thereby forcing the motorist onto designated roads, which are now deemed as highly congested.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the past 10 years many roads have been closed, or converted to one way. By doing this the motorist has been forced to use only the main highways, and not use any 'ratruns'. This has created heavy congestion on these roads, as the infastructure cannot tollerate all the excess traffic. It is time to allow the motorist to use these back roads again and thus eliviate the congestion.
